title: Can the PS5 Beat the PS4? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.04.21
description:
Go to http://brooklinen.com and use promo code games to get $25 off when you spend $100 or more, plus free shipping!

Visit http://joinhoney.com/GAMES to get Honey for FREE today!

Greg and Tim talk about Sony's PS5 plans, Apple's mixed reality headset, and Mass Effect's missing DLC.

00:00:00 - Start
00:07:08 - Housekeeping
There’s a new episode of the Blessing Show up on youtube.com/kindafunnnygames! It’s all about Star Wars video games!
Mega Ran is on KF Podcast today! patreon.com/kindafunny
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: GrahamOfLegend, David Meintel, Trent Berrie, Black Jack, Luiz Aguiar (@8bitLuiz), James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes), &The Nano Biologist
The Roper Report   -
00:09:33 - Can the PS5 beat the PS4? Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:20:50 - Mass Effect 1 DLC Not in Legendary Because of CORRUPTION, @ Matt TM Kim
00:31:30 - More on Apple’s Mixed Reality Headset, N. Ingraham @ Engadget 
00:34:20 - Hitman 3 Roadmap, Darryn Bonthuys
00:37:50 - NFL Gamejam, EDDIE @ GameSpot
00:40:00 - Bethesda Founder Passes Away
00:43:20 - SHORT STACK OF FINANCIALS!
00:47:35 -  Ad  
00:50:20 - Out today
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Laura Kate Dale

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Every day Greg Miller, Blessing Adeoye Jr., and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/

of dlc from mass effect 1 that may be permanently lost the dlc is pinnacle station an add-on for the first mass effect that was originally released on the xbox 360 and included a new map in 13 combat scenarios to help players hone their skills unfortunately in an interview with game informer legendary edition project director mack walters reveals that despite the developers best attempts the dlc source code is corrupted beyond repair word of pinnacle station's source code woes actually dates back to when the mass effect trilogy was released on ps3 as in the legendary edition pinnacle station was not included in the ps3 trilogy at the time the developers shared it was due to source cord corruption that issue persists today when walters revealed that attempts to get the dlc into the legendary edition were quote an emotional roller coaster pinnacle station was actually developed by an external studio called demiurge i remember them bioware contacted demiurge to see if they could get the
